trends: There has been one other sighting in Beltsville
There were no other sightings in Beltsville on or around August 6th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWas out walking my dogs at night. For the past few weeks I've been watching the sky for UFOs and usually can distinguish what is a plane or not by the blinking lights on the bottom of the aircraft, and that's what I have been seeing often that I thought was weird. But I was eyeing the sky tonight (this was coincidental since my phone was out of battery so I couldn't record or photograph.) But, as a skeptic, I was eyeing this object as a plane, but then the object light dims in for a brief second, and then out again. It looked like it was traveling due East. This went on for a short duration and then the dimming stopped and the object was gone. I was sort of stunned and surprised by the whole sighting - I have been watching the skies for a while and seen weird things, that I quickly pointed them out as planes, so when I saw that there were no blinking lights emitting from the object, I continued to watch as it dimmed in and out and again and then stopped, with me losing track of it.
Summary: Odd Light Dimming In and Out
